name: Bubble Burst Escape HD Free - The Trouble Mania Safari Game Saga
name_original: Bubble Burst Escape HD Free - The Trouble Mania Safari Game Saga
description:
!!! Fantastic strategy and brain reaction game. Can you beat this !!!

Bubble Burst Escape is great bubble survival game. Your goal is to collect coins and avoid collision with skull, magnet and bomb bubbles. Awesome finger control gives you great gameplay experience and you can survive many impossible moments in game. This is game what you can play anywhere, because control is so easy, just focus and make your moves to avoid collisions. Great graphics and visual effects finalize gaming experience.

[ FEATURES ]

+ support iOS7
+ Awesome graphics
+ Easy controls
+ Great gaming experience
+ Fantastic effects

!!! How many coins you can collect !!!

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com

Thanks for your support :)
